name: Slender Man - Chapter 1: Alone Free
description:
Escape the urban legend, Slenderman, in this fully 3D action adventure game. How long can you survive? Use the on-screen joystick and look-to-swipe controls to explore the world and run from Slenderman as he chases you in a 2 mile x 2 mile area.

This app runs smoothly and doesn't lag. Control is buttery smooth even on the 3GS!

Slenderman is a mythical creature often depicted as a tall, thin figure wearing a black suit and a blank face. According to the legend, he can stretch or shorten his arms at will and has tentacle-like appendages protruding from his back. Depending on the interpretations of the myth, the creature can cause memory loss, insomnia, paranoia, coughing fits (nicknamed “slendersickness”), photograph/video distortions and can teleport at will.
